name: AWS Storage Gateway - File Gateway
short: A hybrid storage service on AWS that enables on-premises applications to seamlessly use AWS cloud storage.
description: AWS Storage Gateway's File Gateway is a hybrid cloud storage service that provides on-premises applications with file-based, cached access to virtually unlimited cloud storage. It seamlessly integrates with S3, storing data as native S3 objects and enabling cost-effective and scalable storage for backup, archiving, disaster recovery, and cloud bursting. File Gateway supports NFS and SMB protocols, ensuring compatibility with existing applications. It provides low-latency access to data through intelligent caching, offering a blend of local and cloud storage.
